title: 421. How to Prevent Another Great Depression
description: Millions and millions are out of work, with some jobs never coming back. We speak with four economists — and one former presidential candidate — about the best policy options and the lessons (good and bad) from the past.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
